Question
========

A one-way ANOVA is conducted in a sample of 28 individuals randomly assigned to three Factor A conditions. The within-group square sum (SSA) is 40; the between-group square sum (SSE) is 60.

Calculate the *F* value. 
Answerlist
----------
* 1.5
* 0.55
* 5.56
* 8.33

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
